title: All The Artists Announced For Louder Than Life 2025 So Far
description: We'll update this list daily as they keep getting announced.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: We'll update this list daily as they keep getting announced.
text: Louder Than Life 2025 is set to take place between September 18 and 21 in Louisville, KY at the Highland Festival Grounds at Kentucky Exposition Center. The festival has been announcing an artist per day for its lineup, so we've decided to just keep a running list of everyone announced thus far. The lineup thus far is: Slayer Acid Bath Letlive. Lorna Shore Counterparts Static-X Mudvayne Thrown Chimaira Walls Of Jericho 12 Stones Landmvrks Black Veil Brides Spineshank A Perfect Circle Ra Superheaven "What an incredible 10 years it's been, and it's all thanks to you," said Danny Hayes, CEO of Danny Wimmer Presents from the stage on Thursday. "We're so grateful for the amazing Loudmouths who show up every year, and even during a Hurricane, you came out to celebrate our 10th anniversary with us. You are rock and roll!" Tickets and festival information are available here. Want More Metal? html:
Louder Than Life 2025 is set to take place between September 18 and 21 in Louisville, KY at the Highland Festival Grounds at Kentucky Exposition Center. The festival has been announcing an artist per day for its lineup, so we've decided to just keep a running list of everyone announced thus far. The lineup thus far is:

  • Slayer
  • Acid Bath
  • Letlive.
  • Lorna Shore
  • Counterparts
  • Static-X
  • Mudvayne
  • Thrown
  • Chimaira
  • Walls Of Jericho
  • 12 Stones
  • Landmvrks
  • Black Veil Brides
  • Spineshank
  • A Perfect Circle
  • Ra
  • Superheaven

"What an incredible 10 years it's been, and it's all thanks to you," said Danny Hayes, CEO of Danny Wimmer Presents from the stage on Thursday. "We're so grateful for the amazing Loudmouths who show up every year, and even during a Hurricane, you came out to celebrate our 10th anniversary with us. You are rock and roll!"

Tickets and festival information are available here.
